about_the_game:
Maze Monsters is a sprawling, fast-paced 2D dungeon platformer, designed to deliver a new experience across every level. In this game, you'll travel through dark dungeons and winding mazes to face fierce monsters, lurking in wait for someone—or something—to draw their fury.

Choose your character from adventurous, battle-ready humans, robots, heroes, villains, and monsters of your own to set forth on a unique run to explore and discover true power. Be sure to push each unique character in combat and exploration to uncover their potential in the depths below.

Features:

  • Explore the World: Warp from maze to maze, each with its own set of challenges, and face cunning (and not so cunning) monsters in quick, action-packed combat. Each environment is uniquely generated to provide a fresh experience while exploring, and features a range of potential foes, items, and powerful enhancements to collect.

  • Choose Unique Characters to Play and Master: Pick your favorite hero, villain, machine, or monster of your own and use their abilities to push forward. Rank them up to increase their potential and unlock extras.

  • Collect Items, Upgrades, and Powerful Abilities: Across your adventure, you'll find gold and powerful upgrades designed to develop your character. Create a specialized build to suit your playstyle, and take the fight forward.

  • Battle Unique Enemies: Each level comes packed with ruthless and varied foes that will test your mastery of each character.
